title: Using Familiar BI and Reporting Tools to Analyze and Visualize Your MarkLogic Data
abstract: Gain valuable insights across all your data quickly and easily by combining MarkLogic with your favorite Business Intelligence tool. Learn how youâ€™ll be able to make data stored in MarkLogic available for reporting, dashboarding and discovery, as we discuss and demo the integration of MarkLogic and Business Intelligence tools. We'll also introduce the underpinnings of this integration and discuss how this will open your MarkLogic data to most common IT tools. This talk includes a sneak-peek at features that are in the works for some future release of MarkLogic.

surveys.comments: Thought-invoking.  Wish there was more time for Q&A.
